speaker: ANTONIO
text: Will you stay no longer? Nor will you not that

speaker: ANTONIO
text: I go with you?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: By your patience, no. My stars shine darkly

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: over me. The malignancy of my fate might perhaps

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: distemper yours. Therefore I shall crave of you your

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: leave that I may bear my evils alone. It were a bad

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: recompense for your love to lay any of them on you.

speaker: ANTONIO
text: Let me yet know of you whither you are

speaker: ANTONIO
text: bound.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: No, sooth, sir. My determinate voyage is

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: mere extravagancy. But I perceive in you so excellent

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: a touch of modesty that you will not extort

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: from me what I am willing to keep in. Therefore it

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: charges me in manners the rather to express myself.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: You must know of me, then, Antonio, my name

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: is Sebastian, which I called Roderigo. My father was

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: that Sebastian of Messaline whom I know you have

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: heard of. He left behind him myself and a sister,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: both born in an hour. If the heavens had been

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: pleased, would we had so ended! But you, sir,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: altered that, for some hour before you took me

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: from the breach of the sea was my sister drowned.

speaker: ANTONIO
text: Alas the day!

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: A lady, sir, though it was said she much

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: resembled me, was yet of many accounted beautiful.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: But though I could not with such estimable

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: wonder overfar believe that, yet thus far I will boldly

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: publish her: she bore a mind that envy could not but

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: call fair. She is drowned already, sir, with salt water,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: though I seem to drown her remembrance again

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: with more.

speaker: ANTONIO
text: Pardon me, sir, your bad entertainment.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: O good Antonio, forgive me your trouble.

speaker: ANTONIO
text: If you will not murder me for my love, let me

speaker: ANTONIO
text: be your servant.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: If you will not undo what you have done—

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: that is, kill him whom you have recovered—desire

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: it not. Fare you well at once. My bosom is full of

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: kindness, and I am yet so near the manners of my

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: mother that, upon the least occasion more, mine

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: eyes will tell tales of me. I am bound to the Count

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: Orsino’s court. Farewell.

speaker: ANTONIO
text:
The
               
              gentleness
               
              of
               
              all
               
              the
               
              gods
               
              go
               
              with
               
              thee
              !

speaker: ANTONIO
text:
I
               
              have
               
              many
               
              enemies
               
              in
               
              Orsino’s
               
              court
              ,

speaker: ANTONIO
text:
Else
               
              would
               
              I
               
              very
               
              shortly
               
              see
               
              thee
               
              there
              .

speaker: ANTONIO
text:
But
               
              come
               
              what
               
              may
              ,
               
              I
               
              do
               
              adore
               
              thee
               
              so

speaker: ANTONIO
text:
That
               
              danger
               
              shall
               
              seem
               
              sport
              ,
               
              and
               
              I
               
              will
               
              go
              .
